name: Ext_R5_ImagingStudy_procedure
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ImagingStudy.procedure for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ImagingStudy.procedure from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImagingStudy|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: This field corresponds to the DICOM Procedure Code Sequence (0008,1032). This is different from the FHIR Procedure resource that may include the ImagingStudy.
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.procedure` maps to R4B `ImagingStudy.procedureReference`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ImagingStudy.procedure` maps to R4B `ImagingStudy.procedureCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: This field corresponds to the DICOM Procedure Code Sequence (0008,1032). This is different from the FHIR Procedure resource that may include the ImagingStudy.
